components.name: Run Canonical to Target
components.scriptBody:

$SummaryLogFilename = 'Summary_Log_' + GUID();

</trans>

components.name: Format Batch Log Files
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// Format Batch Log Files - Comprehensive Processing System
// Initialize processing environment
$startTime = Now();
$processingId = GUID();
WriteToOperationLog("=== BATCH LOG PROCESSING STARTED ===");
WriteToOperationLog("Processing ID: " + $processingId);
WriteToOperationLog("Start Time: " + FormatDate($startTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"));

// Define log file categories and their processing rules
$logFileCategories = {};
$logFileCategories["summary"] = {
    "path": $SummaryLogPath,
    "type": "SUMMARY",
    "priority": 1,
    "format": "XML",
    "retention": 30,
    "compression": true
};
$logFileCategories["success"] = {
    "path": $SuccessCountPath,
    "type": "METRICS",
    "priority": 2,
    "format": "JSON",
    "retention": 90,
    "compression": false
};
$logFileCategories["failure"] = {
    "path": $FailureCountPath,
    "type": "METRICS",
    "priority": 1,
    "format": "JSON",
    "retention": 180,
    "compression": false
};
$logFileCategories["error"] = {
    "path": $DataErrorPath,
    "type": "ERROR",
    "priority": 0,
    "format": "TEXT",
    "retention": 365,
    "compression": true
};

// Initialize processing statistics
$processingStats = {};
$processingStats["totalFiles"] = 0;
$processingStats["processedFiles"] = 0;
$processingStats["errorFiles"] = 0;
$processingStats["totalSize"] = 0;
$processingStats["compressedSize"] = 0;
$processingStats["processingErrors"] = [];

// Process each log file category with comprehensive error handling
$categoryKeys = Keys($logFileCategories);
For($i = 0; $i < Length($categoryKeys); $i = $i + 1,
    $category = $categoryKeys[$i];
    $config = $logFileCategories[$category];
    $filePath = $config["path"];
    
    WriteToOperationLog("Processing category: " + $category + " (Priority: " + $config["priority"] + ")");
    $processingStats["totalFiles"] = $processingStats["totalFiles"] + 1;
    
    If(FileExists($filePath),
        Try(
            // Read and analyze file
            $fileContent = ReadFile($filePath);
            $fileSize = Length($fileContent);
            $processingStats["totalSize"] = $processingStats["totalSize"] + $fileSize;
            
            WriteToOperationLog("  ✓ File found: " + $filePath);
            WriteToOperationLog("  ✓ Size: " + $fileSize + " bytes");
            WriteToOperationLog("  ✓ Format: " + $config["format"]);
            
            // Generate comprehensive file metadata and processing report
            $metadata = {};
            $metadata["originalSize"] = $fileSize;
            $metadata["category"] = $category;
            $metadata["type"] = $config["type"];
            $metadata["format"] = $config["format"];
            $metadata["processedAt"] = FormatDate(Now(), "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss");
            $metadata["processingId"] = $processingId;
            $metadata["retentionDays"] = $config["retention"];
            
            $processingStats["processedFiles"] = $processingStats["processedFiles"] + 1;
            
        , // catch processing errors
            WriteToOperationLog("  ✗ Processing error: " + $ERROR);
            $processingStats["errorFiles"] = $processingStats["errorFiles"] + 1;
        );
    , // else file not found
        WriteToOperationLog("  ⚠ File not found: " + $filePath);
        $processingStats["errorFiles"] = $processingStats["errorFiles"] + 1;
    );
);

// Generate final processing report
$endTime = Now();
$processingDuration = DateDiff($endTime, $startTime, "seconds");
$processingRate = ($processingStats["processedFiles"] / $processingStats["totalFiles"]) * 100;

WriteToOperationLog("=== BATCH LOG PROCESSING COMPLETED ===");
WriteToOperationLog("Duration: " + $processingDuration + " seconds");
WriteToOperationLog("Processing rate: " + Round($processingRate, 2) + "%");
</trans>

components.name: Logging and Notification Rollup
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// Logging and Notification Rollup Script
// Consolidate all operation logs and prepare email notifications

$currentTime = Now();
$operationId = GetOperationId();
$projectName = GetProjectName();

// Initialize rollup variables
$totalRecordsProcessed = 0;
$successfulRecords = 0;
$errorRecords = 0;
$warningRecords = 0;

// Collect operation statistics
$operationStats = GetOperationStats();
If(IsValid($operationStats),
    $totalRecordsProcessed = $operationStats["totalProcessed"];
    $successfulRecords = $operationStats["successful"];
    $errorRecords = $operationStats["errors"];
    $warningRecords = $operationStats["warnings"];
);

// Build comprehensive email message
$EmailSubject = $projectName + " - Operation Summary [" + FormatDate($currentTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm") + "]";

$EmailMessage = "=== OPERATION SUMMARY ===" + "\n\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Project: " + $projectName + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Operation ID: " + $operationId + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Execution Time: " + FormatDate($currentTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Source: " + $SourceIdentifier + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Target: " + $TargetIdentifier + "\n\n";

$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "=== PROCESSING RESULTS ===" + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Total Records: " + $totalRecordsProcessed + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Successful: " + $successfulRecords + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Errors: " + $errorRecords + "\n";
$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Warnings: " + $warningRecords + "\n";

If($totalRecordsProcessed > 0,
    $successRate = ($successfulRecords / $totalRecordsProcessed) * 100;
    $EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Success Rate: " + Round($successRate, 2) + "%" + "\n";
);

$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "\n=== LOG DETAILS ===" + "\n";
If(Length($email_summary) > 0,
    $EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Summary Log: " + $email_summary + "\n";
);
If(Length($email_dataError) > 0,
    $EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "Error Details: " + $email_dataError + "\n";
);

$EmailMessage = $EmailMessage + "\n=== END SUMMARY ===" + "\n";

WriteToOperationLog("Logging and Notification Rollup Complete");
WriteToOperationLog("Email prepared - Subject: " + $EmailSubject);
WriteToOperationLog("Total records processed: " + $totalRecordsProcessed);
</trans>

components.name: On Failure Email
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// RQ-136: Enhanced failure notification system with comprehensive error handling
// Initialize error tracking and notification system
$startTime = Now();
$errorId = GUID();
$failureCount = 0;
$criticalErrorFlag = false;

WriteToOperationLog("=== FAILURE NOTIFICATION SYSTEM ACTIVATED ===");
WriteToOperationLog("Error ID: " + $errorId);
WriteToOperationLog("Timestamp: " + FormatDate($startTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"));

// Capture comprehensive error context
$errorContext = Dict();
$errorContext["errorId"] = $errorId;
$errorContext["timestamp"] = $startTime;
$errorContext["operationName"] = $jitterbit.operation.name;
$errorContext["projectName"] = $projectName;
$errorContext["environmentName"] = GetEnvironmentName();
$errorContext["agentName"] = GetAgentName();
$errorContext["organizationName"] = GetOrganizationName();

// Get detailed error information
$lastError = GetLastError();
$errorContext["errorMessage"] = $lastError;
$errorContext["errorType"] = "OPERATION_FAILURE";

// Determine error severity
If(Contains($lastError, "CRITICAL") || Contains($lastError, "FATAL") || Contains($lastError, "ABORT"),
    $errorContext["severity"] = "CRITICAL";
    $criticalErrorFlag = true;
    WriteToOperationLog("🚨 CRITICAL ERROR DETECTED: " + $lastError),
    
    If(Contains($lastError, "WARNING") || Contains($lastError, "WARN"),
        $errorContext["severity"] = "WARNING";
        WriteToOperationLog("⚠️ WARNING LEVEL ERROR: " + $lastError),
        
        $errorContext["severity"] = "ERROR";
        WriteToOperationLog("❌ STANDARD ERROR: " + $lastError)
    )
);

// Build comprehensive error report
$errorReport = "=== JITTERBIT OPERATION FAILURE REPORT ===" + "\n\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Error ID: " + $errorId + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Timestamp: " + FormatDate($startTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss") + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Operation: " + $jitterbit.operation.name + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Project: " + $projectName + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Environment: " + GetEnvironmentName() + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Agent: " + GetAgentName() + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Organization: " + GetOrganizationName() + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "Severity: " + $errorContext["severity"] + "\n\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "ERROR DETAILS:\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + $lastError + "\n\n";

// Add system information
$errorReport = $errorReport + "SYSTEM INFORMATION:\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "- Memory Usage: " + GetMemoryUsage() + " MB\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "- Active Connections: " + GetActiveConnections() + "\n";
$errorReport = $errorReport + "- Operation Runtime: " + (Now() - $jitterbit.operation.start_time) + " seconds\n\n";

// Add troubleshooting recommendations
$errorReport = $errorReport + "RECOMMENDED ACTIONS:\n";
If($criticalErrorFlag,
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "1. IMMEDIATE: Stop all related operations\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "2. URGENT: Check system resources and connectivity\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "3. CRITICAL: Review error logs for root cause\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "4. ESCALATE: Contact system administrator immediately\n",
    
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "1. Review operation configuration\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "2. Check source/target connectivity\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "3. Verify data format and mappings\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "4. Retry operation after resolving issues\n"
);

$errorReport = $errorReport + "\nFor support, reference Error ID: " + $errorId;

// Log the complete error report
WriteToOperationLog($errorReport);

// Send failure notification email
If($email_enabled == true,
    $emailResult = SendEmail("Failure Notification");
    If(Length($emailResult) > 0,
        WriteToOperationLog("❌ Failed to send notification email: " + $emailResult);
        $failureCount = $failureCount + 1,
        WriteToOperationLog("✅ Failure notification email sent successfully")
    ),
    WriteToOperationLog("📧 Email notifications disabled - skipping email send")
);

// Update failure statistics
$failureCount = $failureCount + 1;
WriteToOperationLog("Total failure notifications processed: " + $failureCount);

// Set global error state for downstream operations
$globalErrorState = $errorContext;
$lastFailureTimestamp = $startTime;

WriteToOperationLog("=== FAILURE NOTIFICATION PROCESSING COMPLETE ===");
</trans>

    $errorReport = $errorReport + "4. ESCALATE: Contact system administrator immediately\n",
    
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "1. Review operation configuration\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "2. Check source/target connectivity\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "3. Verify data format and mappings\n";
    $errorReport = $errorReport + "4. Retry operation after resolving issues\n"
);

$errorReport = $errorReport + "\nFor support, reference Error ID: " + $errorId;

// Log the complete error report
WriteToOperationLog($errorReport);

// Send failure notification email
If($email_enabled == true,
    $emailResult = SendEmail("Failure Notification");
    If(Length($emailResult) > 0,
        WriteToOperationLog("❌ Failed to send notification email: " + $emailResult);
        $failureCount = $failureCount + 1,
        WriteToOperationLog("✅ Failure notification email sent successfully")
    ),
    WriteToOperationLog("📧 Email notifications disabled - skipping email send")
);

// Update failure statistics
$failureCount = $failureCount + 1;
WriteToOperationLog("Total failure notifications processed: " + $failureCount);

// Set global error state for downstream operations
$globalErrorState = $errorContext;
$lastFailureTimestamp = $startTime;

WriteToOperationLog("=== FAILURE NOTIFICATION PROCESSING COMPLETE ===");
</trans>

components.name: NetSuite Country Dict
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// NetSuite Country Dictionary - Complete mapping for international operations
$CountryDict = {};

// North America
$CountryDict["US"] = "United States";
$CountryDict["CA"] = "Canada";
$CountryDict["MX"] = "Mexico";

// Europe
$CountryDict["GB"] = "United Kingdom";
$CountryDict["DE"] = "Germany";
$CountryDict["FR"] = "France";
$CountryDict["IT"] = "Italy";
$CountryDict["ES"] = "Spain";
$CountryDict["NL"] = "Netherlands";
$CountryDict["BE"] = "Belgium";
$CountryDict["AT"] = "Austria";
$CountryDict["CH"] = "Switzerland";
$CountryDict["SE"] = "Sweden";
$CountryDict["NO"] = "Norway";
$CountryDict["DK"] = "Denmark";
$CountryDict["FI"] = "Finland";
$CountryDict["IE"] = "Ireland";
$CountryDict["PT"] = "Portugal";
$CountryDict["GR"] = "Greece";
$CountryDict["PL"] = "Poland";
$CountryDict["CZ"] = "Czech Republic";
$CountryDict["HU"] = "Hungary";
$CountryDict["SK"] = "Slovakia";
$CountryDict["SI"] = "Slovenia";
$CountryDict["HR"] = "Croatia";

components.name: Setup Email Notification
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// RQ-136: Comprehensive email notification configuration system
// Initialize email notification framework
$startTime = Now();
$configId = GUID();
WriteToOperationLog("=== EMAIL NOTIFICATION SETUP INITIATED ===");
WriteToOperationLog("Configuration ID: " + $configId);
WriteToOperationLog("Setup timestamp: " + FormatDate($startTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"));

// Email notification configuration
$EmailNotification = true;
$emailConfig = Dict();

// Basic email settings
$emailConfig["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["configId"] = $configId;
$emailConfig["setupTime"] = $startTime;
$emailConfig["environment"] = GetEnvironmentName();
$emailConfig["project"] = $projectName;
$emailConfig["agent"] = GetAgentName();
$emailConfig["organization"] = GetOrganizationName();

// Email types and priorities
$emailConfig["types"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["types"]["success"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["types"]["success"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["types"]["success"]["priority"] = "LOW";
$emailConfig["types"]["success"]["template"] = "success_notification";

$emailConfig["types"]["warning"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["types"]["warning"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["types"]["warning"]["priority"] = "MEDIUM";
$emailConfig["types"]["warning"]["template"] = "warning_notification";

$emailConfig["types"]["error"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["types"]["error"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["types"]["error"]["priority"] = "HIGH";
$emailConfig["types"]["error"]["template"] = "error_notification";

$emailConfig["types"]["critical"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["types"]["critical"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["types"]["critical"]["priority"] = "URGENT";
$emailConfig["types"]["critical"]["template"] = "critical_notification";

// Recipient configuration
$emailConfig["recipients"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["recipients"]["primary"] = "admin@company.com";
$emailConfig["recipients"]["secondary"] = "support@company.com";
$emailConfig["recipients"]["escalation"] = "manager@company.com";

// Notification frequency settings
$emailConfig["frequency"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["frequency"]["success"] = "BATCH";  // Batch success notifications
$emailConfig["frequency"]["warning"] = "IMMEDIATE";  // Immediate warning notifications
$emailConfig["frequency"]["error"] = "IMMEDIATE";  // Immediate error notifications
$emailConfig["frequency"]["critical"] = "IMMEDIATE";  // Immediate critical notifications

// Email throttling configuration
$emailConfig["throttling"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["throttling"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["throttling"]["maxPerHour"] = 50;
$emailConfig["throttling"]["maxPerDay"] = 500;
$emailConfig["throttling"]["cooldownMinutes"] = 5;

// Email content configuration
$emailConfig["content"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["content"]["includeSystemInfo"] = true;
$emailConfig["content"]["includeStackTrace"] = true;
$emailConfig["content"]["includeOperationDetails"] = true;
$emailConfig["content"]["includeTimestamp"] = true;
$emailConfig["content"]["includeEnvironmentInfo"] = true;

// Retry configuration for failed email sends
$emailConfig["retry"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["retry"]["enabled"] = true;
$emailConfig["retry"]["maxAttempts"] = 3;
$emailConfig["retry"]["retryDelaySeconds"] = 30;
$emailConfig["retry"]["exponentialBackoff"] = true;

// Email validation and testing
$emailConfig["validation"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["validation"]["validateRecipients"] = true;
$emailConfig["validation"]["testEmailOnSetup"] = false;  // Set to true for testing
$emailConfig["validation"]["requireAcknowledgment"] = false;

// Logging configuration
$emailConfig["logging"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["logging"]["logAllEmails"] = true;
$emailConfig["logging"]["logFailedEmails"] = true;
$emailConfig["logging"]["logEmailContent"] = false;  // Security: don't log sensitive content
$emailConfig["logging"]["retentionDays"] = 30;

// Security settings
$emailConfig["security"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["security"]["encryptContent"] = false;
$emailConfig["security"]["sanitizeContent"] = true;
$emailConfig["security"]["maskSensitiveData"] = true;
$emailConfig["security"]["allowExternalRecipients"] = true;

// Performance monitoring
$emailConfig["performance"] = Dict();
$emailConfig["performance"]["trackDeliveryTime"] = true;
$emailConfig["performance"]["trackOpenRates"] = false;
$emailConfig["performance"]["trackClickRates"] = false;
$emailConfig["performance"]["generateReports"] = true;

// Initialize email statistics
$emailStats = Dict();
$emailStats["totalSent"] = 0;
$emailStats["totalFailed"] = 0;
$emailStats["lastSentTime"] = null;
$emailStats["lastFailureTime"] = null;
$emailStats["configurationTime"] = $startTime;

// Validate email configuration
$validationErrors = [];
If(Length($emailConfig["recipients"]["primary"]) == 0,
    $validationErrors = Append($validationErrors, "Primary recipient not configured")
);

If(Length($validationErrors) > 0,
    WriteToOperationLog("⚠️ Email configuration validation warnings:");
    For($i = 0; $i < Length($validationErrors); $i++,
        WriteToOperationLog("  - " + $validationErrors[$i])
    ),
    WriteToOperationLog("✅ Email configuration validation passed")
);

// Log configuration summary
WriteToOperationLog("Email notification configuration summary:");
WriteToOperationLog("- Enabled: " + $emailConfig["enabled"]);
WriteToOperationLog("- Primary recipient: " + $emailConfig["recipients"]["primary"]);
WriteToOperationLog("- Error notifications: " + $emailConfig["types"]["error"]["enabled"]);
WriteToOperationLog("- Throttling enabled: " + $emailConfig["throttling"]["enabled"]);
WriteToOperationLog("- Max emails per hour: " + $emailConfig["throttling"]["maxPerHour"]);

// Set global variables for use by other scripts
$globalEmailConfig = $emailConfig;
$globalEmailStats = $emailStats;
$email_notification_ready = true;

WriteToOperationLog("✅ Email notification setup completed successfully");
WriteToOperationLog("=== EMAIL NOTIFICATION SETUP COMPLETE ===");
</trans>

components.name: Write Batch Log Files
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog("Batch Log Files Written");
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog("Batch Log Files Written");
</trans>

components.name: Run Initial Data Load
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:START Initial Data Load</TAG>");
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
RunOperation("<TAG>operation:START Initial Data Load</TAG>");
</trans>

components.name: Set Salesforce Where Clause
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
$WhereClause = "LastModifiedDate > " + $LastModifiedDate;
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
$WhereClause = "LastModifiedDate > " + $LastModifiedDate;
</trans>

components.name: Set Logging Variables
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
// RQ-137: Comprehensive logging variable initialization system
// Initialize logging framework
$startTime = Now();
$loggingSessionId = GUID();
WriteToOperationLog("=== LOGGING VARIABLES INITIALIZATION ===");
WriteToOperationLog("Session ID: " + $loggingSessionId);
WriteToOperationLog("Initialization time: " + FormatDate($startTime, "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss"));

// Core logging state variables
$logsWritten = false;
$logLevel = "INFO";  // DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, FATAL
$logRotationEnabled = true;
$maxLogFileSize = 10485760;  // 10MB in bytes
$maxLogFiles = 5;

// Logging configuration
$loggingConfig = Dict();
$loggingConfig["sessionId"] = $loggingSessionId;
$loggingConfig["startTime"] = $startTime;
$loggingConfig["level"] = $logLevel;
$loggingConfig["rotation"] = $logRotationEnabled;
$loggingConfig["maxFileSize"] = $maxLogFileSize;
$loggingConfig["maxFiles"] = $maxLogFiles;

// Log file paths and naming
$loggingConfig["paths"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["paths"]["base"] = "/var/log/jitterbit/";
$loggingConfig["paths"]["operation"] = $loggingConfig["paths"]["base"] + "operations/";
$loggingConfig["paths"]["error"] = $loggingConfig["paths"]["base"] + "errors/";
$loggingConfig["paths"]["debug"] = $loggingConfig["paths"]["base"] + "debug/";
$loggingConfig["paths"]["audit"] = $loggingConfig["paths"]["base"] + "audit/";

// Log file naming patterns
$dateStamp = FormatDate($startTime, "yyyyMMdd");
$timeStamp = FormatDate($startTime, "HHmmss");
$loggingConfig["files"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["files"]["operation"] = "operation_" + $dateStamp + "_" + $timeStamp + ".log";
$loggingConfig["files"]["error"] = "error_" + $dateStamp + "_" + $timeStamp + ".log";
$loggingConfig["files"]["debug"] = "debug_" + $dateStamp + "_" + $timeStamp + ".log";
$loggingConfig["files"]["audit"] = "audit_" + $dateStamp + "_" + $timeStamp + ".log";

// Performance logging variables
$loggingConfig["performance"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["performance"]["enabled"] = true;
$loggingConfig["performance"]["trackMemory"] = true;
$loggingConfig["performance"]["trackCPU"] = true;
$loggingConfig["performance"]["trackNetwork"] = true;
$loggingConfig["performance"]["sampleInterval"] = 30;  // seconds

// Error tracking variables
$loggingConfig["errors"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["errors"]["trackStackTrace"] = true;
$loggingConfig["errors"]["trackContext"] = true;
$loggingConfig["errors"]["autoEscalate"] = true;
$loggingConfig["errors"]["escalationThreshold"] = 5;  // errors per hour

// Audit logging variables
$loggingConfig["audit"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["audit"]["enabled"] = true;
$loggingConfig["audit"]["trackDataAccess"] = true;
$loggingConfig["audit"]["trackConfigChanges"] = true;
$loggingConfig["audit"]["trackUserActions"] = true;
$loggingConfig["audit"]["retentionDays"] = 90;

// Log formatting configuration
$loggingConfig["format"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["format"]["includeTimestamp"] = true;
$loggingConfig["format"]["includeLevel"] = true;
$loggingConfig["format"]["includeSessionId"] = true;
$loggingConfig["format"]["includeThreadId"] = false;
$loggingConfig["format"]["includeSourceLocation"] = false;

// Initialize log counters
$logCounters = Dict();
$logCounters["debug"] = 0;
$logCounters["info"] = 0;
$logCounters["warn"] = 0;
$logCounters["error"] = 0;
$logCounters["fatal"] = 0;
$logCounters["total"] = 0;

// Log buffer configuration for performance
$loggingConfig["buffer"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["buffer"]["enabled"] = true;
$loggingConfig["buffer"]["size"] = 1000;  // messages
$loggingConfig["buffer"]["flushInterval"] = 60;  // seconds
$loggingConfig["buffer"]["autoFlushOnError"] = true;

// Security and compliance logging
$loggingConfig["security"] = Dict();
$loggingConfig["security"]["maskSensitiveData"] = true;
$loggingConfig["security"]["encryptLogs"] = false;
$loggingConfig["security"]["signLogs"] = false;
$loggingConfig["security"]["compressLogs"] = true;

// Set global logging variables for use by other components
$globalLoggingConfig = $loggingConfig;
$globalLogCounters = $logCounters;
$loggingInitialized = true;

// Log the configuration summary
WriteToOperationLog("Logging configuration initialized:");
WriteToOperationLog("- Session ID: " + $loggingSessionId);
WriteToOperationLog("- Log level: " + $logLevel);
WriteToOperationLog("- Rotation enabled: " + $logRotationEnabled);
WriteToOperationLog("- Max file size: " + ($maxLogFileSize / 1024 / 1024) + " MB");
WriteToOperationLog("- Performance tracking: " + $loggingConfig["performance"]["enabled"]);
WriteToOperationLog("- Audit logging: " + $loggingConfig["audit"]["enabled"]);

WriteToOperationLog("✅ Logging variables initialization completed");
WriteToOperationLog("=== LOGGING VARIABLES READY ===");
</trans>

// Security and compliance logging

// Log the configuration summary

components.name: Print Insert Summary
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog("Insert Summary: " + $InsertCount + " records inserted");
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:
<trans>
WriteToOperationLog("Insert Summary: " + $InsertCount + " records inserted");
</trans>

components.name: Test Email
components.scriptBody:
<trans>
RunScript("<TAG>script:Setup Email Notification</TAG>");
$EmailSubject = "Test Jitterbit Email";
$EmailMessage = "Email recipient configure correctly!";
emailErrorMessage =  SendEmailMessage("<TAG>email:Log Results</TAG>");
If(Bool(Length(emailErrorMessage)),
 emailErrorMessage = "Failed to send email. Error message: " + emailErrorMessage;
 RaiseError(emailErrorMessage),
 WriteToOperationLog("Test email message attempted. Check if the configured recipients got a test notification.");
 WriteToOperationLog("If so, you're set up properly!");
 WriteToOperationLog("If not, you might want to double check that the email recipient provided is valid.");
);
</trans>
components.scriptBodyCleansed:

 WriteToOperationLog("If so, you're set up properly!");
 WriteToOperationLog("If not, you might want to double check that the email recipient provided is valid.");
);
</trans>
